[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-text-canvas](./harp-text-canvas.md) &gt; [TextCanvas](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.md) &gt; [measureText](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.measuretext.md)

## TextCanvas.measureText() method

Returns the computed bounding box for the input text. The current \[\[TextRenderStyle\]\] and \[\[TextLayoutStyle\]\] will influence the results of this function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
measureText(text: string | GlyphData[], outputBounds: THREE.Box2, params?: MeasurementParameters): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | string \| [GlyphData](./harp-text-canvas.glyphdata.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Input text. Provide an array of \[\[GlyphData\]\] for better performance. |
|  outputBounds | THREE.Box2 | Output text bounding box. |
|  params | [MeasurementParameters](./harp-text-canvas.measurementparameters.md) | Optional measurement parameters. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

Result of the measurement. If `false`<!-- -->, some error occurred during execution and the input text couldn't be properly measured.
